Metadata.title: World Public Spending - Transparency on Government Spending
Metadata.description: Explore government spending data around the world. Access transparent, up-to-date information about government expenditures, budgets, and financial allocations globally.
Metadata.keywords: government spending, public spending, government transparency, open data, government budgets, public finance, government expenditure, fiscal transparency
Metadata.creator: World Public Spending

LandingPage.title: It’s Your Money. See Where It Goes.
LandingPage.description: Discover how governments spend public funds — from taxes to healthcare, education, and more. Transparent. Global. Open to everyone.

AboutPage.title: About Public Spending World
AboutPage.description: Explore how countries around the world collect and spend public money. Understanding taxes. Understanding world.
AboutPage.missionText: We believe that public finances should be transparent, accessible, and understandable for everyone. Our mission is to break down tax revenues and government expenditures, showing exactly where your money goes and empowering citizens with knowledge about public spending worldwide.
AboutPage.offerText: Our platform provides insights into controversial taxes, their efficiency and fairness, and the real impact of public spending on society. We aggregate and standardize financial data from countries across the globe, making it easy to analyze and understand how governments manage public resources.
AboutPage.feature1Text: Explore controversial taxes, understand their necessity, and evaluate their efficiency and fairness across different countries.
AboutPage.feature2Text: Discover the real impact of public spending on society through comprehensive data analysis and visualization.
AboutPage.feature3Text: Compare how different countries collect and spend public money, with regular updates and historical trends.
AboutPage.contributeText: Want to contribute data about your country? Whether you're a developer, data scientist, or citizen interested in public finance, your contributions are welcome! Help us make public finances more transparent for everyone.

overview.revenueTooltip: Shows the main sources of government income, helping to understand how the country funds its public services.
overview.spendingTooltip: Shows how government funds are distributed across different sectors, revealing national priorities and commitments.

analysis.controversiesTooltip: Fiscal controversies highlight political, social, or economic challenges that can affect a country's stability and future policy direction.
analysis.efficiencyTooltip: Measures how well public funds are used to achieve desired outcomes. High efficiency means more value for taxpayers and better services.

Footer.description: Empowering transparency in global public spending through accessible data and insights.
